title: (x) Postal Service - Give Up - Album Cover - Agency Gothic Open {Florian}
content:
Hey folks,

Anyone know what font is being used on this Postal Service album cover?

Thanks,

Joe

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014048im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Give_Up-Postal_ServiceX_The_480_6705.gif)
author: jidoe

comments.content: It looks like [Agency FB Regular Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014048/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AgencyFB/styles) with a manual stroke and offset.

CastleType has the [outlined/shaded version](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014048/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/agency-gothic-ct/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D52%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTHE%2520POSTaL%2520SERVICE%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D35?refby=mfde).  
The â€˜A' with round top is in the lowercase.
